Items.Item:
Privacy Policy Milkman is a client application designed for connecting you with the excellent Remember The Milk service. Note that by using the Remember The Milk service, you also are likely bound by their terms of service (available at https://www.rememberthemilk.com/help/terms.rtm) as well as their privacy policy (available at https://www.rememberthemilk.com/help/privacy.rtm). This policy is additive to that of the Remember The Milk privacy policy, since Milkman is only a client application.
Information Collected In the event of an application error, crash, or problem, we may ask you to send an email message with crash information. Such an email may contain personally identifiable information, and it is your choice whether to send such a message. While using the app, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you and help you resolve support or assistance with the app. This will happen through a prompt asking for feedback, allowing you to send an e-mail message, and is not automatic. When you chose to interact with Remember The Milk, we collect an authentication token through an authentication mechanism with the service. As part of this process, we also will then validate the credentials by requesting the profile information for the primary account, and this information may include your email address, name, and any other fields returned from the user lookup with the Remember The Milk API. Your password is never stored by the application. In order to provide you with a better experience, to improve the application and its services, we may share non-identifying information (such as the current page within the application being viewed) to serve you better and analyze and understand how the app is used. There are application preferences that may enable or turn off such functionality.
Age Policy Within accordance of Microsoft's Application Certification Requirements for Windows Phone, you must not create an account if you are not of the age of 13. As the Milkman application does not require an account, this clause is handled by the Remember The Milk terms of use, which designates that those younger than 13 may not use the service.
Notes Remember The Milk is a trademark of Remember The Milk. This application uses the Remember The Milk application programming interface but is not endorsed or certified by Remember The Milk.
Contacting the Author If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at milkman@mbmccormick.com.

Version 2.4 This release now uses HTTPS when communicating with Remember The Milk. Redesigned some of the layouts and font sizes throughout the application. This release also includes several bug fixes.
Version 2.3 This release is completely localized and translated to Spanish and Italian. This also includes several bug fixes and an updated about dialog.
Version 2.2 This release includes several bug fixes and stability improvements. All lists now take advantage of the date view, instead of limiting this to the All Tasks list. The live tile now includes overdue tasks in the task count. This release also includes several user interface enhancements.
Version 2.1 This release includes a critical bug fix to the task reminders functionality. The Add Note page now has labels on the title and body fields. Some additional small bug fixes are included.
Version 2.0 This major release completely revamps the Milkman interface. You can now view tasks by date, list, or smart list. You can customize your task reminders and location notifications. You can now pin any list or smart list as a live tile on your start screen. By request, you can choose between light or dark theme. This version also has a faster, more streamlined Add Task dialog. Lastly, there are several bug fixes included.
Version 1.3 This release includes the ability to add, edit, and delete notes for tasks. You can also now choose to manually sync your tasks instead of doing so automatically, to improve speed of the application. This also includes several bug fixes and some tweaks to the user interface.
Version 1.2 This minor release includes some small bug fixes for task reminders and some security fixes. It also includes higher-resolution icon images.
Version 1.1 This release includes several bug fixes to improve reliability of location-based reminders, live tile updates, and reminder scheduling. The Edit Task page now has spell check and autocomplete functionality. When an exception occurs, users now have the option of sending a bug report with diagnostics information about the crash to the developer.
Version 1.0 This is the first release of Milkman and contains the basic features provided by Remember The Milk and fully integrates with the Windows Phone 7.5 experience.
